assessmentPatterns.name: Authentic Task
assessmentPatterns.description: Real-world problem requiring application of knowledge

template.title: Authentic Task: [Context]
template.aiRiskGuidance: Scaffold with process constraints, peer review, live viva

assessmentPatterns.name: Case Study Analysis
assessmentPatterns.description: Structured analysis of a real or realistic scenario

template.title: Case Study Analysis: [Context]
template.aiRiskGuidance: Require original interpretation; embed Turnitin check; randomise case studies

template.title: Live Presentation: [Topic]
template.aiRiskGuidance: Synchronous live Q&A ensures authenticity; record for students unable to attend live

assessmentPatterns.name: Learning Portfolio
assessmentPatterns.description: Curated collection of evidence with reflective commentary

template.title: Learning Portfolio: [Module Topic]
template.aiRiskGuidance: Require live viva or presentation of portfolio; avoid standalone written submission
scaffoldSteps: Final portfolio with live viva (15 min)

assessmentPatterns.name: Peer Review & Critique
assessmentPatterns.description: Students assess peer work using rubric, fostering critical evaluation

template.title: Peer Review: [Assignment]
template.aiRiskGuidance: Use structured rubric; require 2+ peer reviews minimum; tutor spot-checks quality
scaffoldSteps: Tutor quality check on 20% of feedback
Revision window based on peer + tutor feedback

assessmentPatterns.name: Multiple Choice Quiz
assessmentPatterns.description: Automated knowledge check with instant feedback

template.title: Knowledge Check: [Topic]
template.aiRiskGuidance: Randomise question/answer order; use only for formative check or low-stakes summative
scaffoldSteps: Tutorial: Quiz format and example Qs
Summative quiz (1 attempt, 45 min time limit)

assessmentPatterns.name: Online Discussion & Participation
assessmentPatterns.description: Asynchronous peer dialogue with rubric-based grading

template.title: Discussion Forum: [Theme]
template.aiRiskGuidance: Combine with quiz or poll; require evidence of critical engagement (not just agreement)
scaffoldSteps: Forum guidelines and rubric (clarity, evidence, engagement)

assessmentPatterns.name: Diagnostic Pre-test
assessmentPatterns.description: Baseline knowledge assessment to inform teaching

template.title: Diagnostic Pre-test: [Topic]
evidence: Responses to conceptual or skill-based items (ungraded)
template.aiRiskGuidance: Formative only; share results with students to motivate learning
